AbortDocumentVersionUpload.name: AbortDocumentVersionUpload
AbortDocumentVersionUpload.description:
Grants permission to abort the upload of the specified document version that was previously
                                                initiated by InitiateDocumentVersionUpload.

ActivateUser.name: ActivateUser
ActivateUser.description:
Grants permission to activate the specified user. Only active users can access Amazon
                                                WorkDocs.

AddResourcePermissions.name: AddResourcePermissions
AddResourcePermissions.description: Grants permission to create a set of permissions for the specified folder or document.

AddUserToGroup.name: AddUserToGroup
AddUserToGroup.description: Grants permission to add a user to a group.

CheckAlias.name: CheckAlias
CheckAlias.description: Grants permission to check an alias.

CreateComment.name: CreateComment
CreateComment.description: Grants permission to add a new comment to the specified document version.

CreateCustomMetadata.name: CreateCustomMetadata
CreateCustomMetadata.description: Grants permission to add one or more custom properties to the specified resource.

CreateFolder.name: CreateFolder
CreateFolder.description: Grants permission to create a folder with the specified name and parent folder.

CreateInstance.name: CreateInstance
CreateInstance.description: Grants permission to create an instance.

CreateLabels.name: CreateLabels
CreateLabels.description: Grants permission to add labels to the given resource.

CreateNotificationSubscription.name: CreateNotificationSubscription
CreateNotificationSubscription.description: Grants permission to configure WorkDocs to use Amazon SNS notifications.

CreateUser.name: CreateUser
CreateUser.description: Grants permission to create a user in a Simple AD or Microsoft AD directory.

DeactivateUser.name: DeactivateUser
DeactivateUser.description:
Grants permission to deactivate the specified user, which revokes the user's access
                                                to Amazon WorkDocs.

DeleteComment.name: DeleteComment
DeleteComment.description: Grants permission to delete the specified comment from the document version.

DeleteCustomMetadata.name: DeleteCustomMetadata
DeleteCustomMetadata.description: Grants permission to delete custom metadata from the specified resource.

DeleteDocument.name: DeleteDocument
DeleteDocument.description:
Grants permission to permanently delete the specified document and its associated
                                                metadata.

DeleteFolder.name: DeleteFolder
DeleteFolder.description: Grants permission to permanently delete the specified folder and its contents.

DeleteFolderContents.name: DeleteFolderContents
DeleteFolderContents.description: Grants permission to delete the contents of the specified folder.

DeleteInstance.name: DeleteInstance
DeleteInstance.description: Grants permission to delete an instance.

DeleteLabels.name: DeleteLabels
DeleteLabels.description: Grants permission to delete one or more labels from a resource.

DeleteNotificationSubscription.name: DeleteNotificationSubscription
DeleteNotificationSubscription.description: Grants permission to delete the specified subscription from the specified organization.

DeleteUser.name: DeleteUser
DeleteUser.description: Grants permission to delete the specified user from a Simple AD or Microsoft AD directory.

DeregisterDirectory.name: DeregisterDirectory
DeregisterDirectory.description: Grants permission to deregister a directory.

DescribeActivities.name: DescribeActivities
DescribeActivities.description: Grants permission to fetch user activities in a specified time period.

DescribeAvailableDirectories.name: DescribeAvailableDirectories
DescribeAvailableDirectories.description: Grants permission to describe available directories.

DescribeComments.name: DescribeComments
DescribeComments.description: Grants permission to list all the comments for the specified document version.

DescribeDocumentVersions.name: DescribeDocumentVersions
DescribeDocumentVersions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the document versions for the specified document.

DescribeFolderContents.name: DescribeFolderContents
DescribeFolderContents.description:
Grants permission to describe the contents of the specified folder, including its
                                                documents and sub-folders.

DescribeGroups.name: DescribeGroups
DescribeGroups.description: Grants permission to describe the user groups.

DescribeNotificationSubscriptions.name: DescribeNotificationSubscriptions
DescribeNotificationSubscriptions.description: Grants permission to list the specified notification subscriptions.

DescribeResourcePermissions.name: DescribeResourcePermissions
DescribeResourcePermissions.description: Grants permission to view a description of a specified resource's permissions.

DescribeRootFolders.name: DescribeRootFolders
DescribeRootFolders.description: Grants permission to describe the root folders.

DescribeUsers.name: DescribeUsers
DescribeUsers.description:
Grants permission to view a description of the specified users. You can describe all
                                                users or filter the results (for example, by status or organization).

DownloadDocumentVersion.name: DownloadDocumentVersion
DownloadDocumentVersion.description: Grants permission to download a specified document version.

GetCurrentUser.name: GetCurrentUser
GetCurrentUser.description: Grants permission to retrieve the details of the current user.

GetDocument.name: GetDocument
GetDocument.description: Grants permission to retrieve the specified document object.

GetDocumentPath.name: GetDocumentPath
GetDocumentPath.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the path information (the hierarchy from the root folder)
                                                for the requested document.

GetDocumentVersion.name: GetDocumentVersion
GetDocumentVersion.description: Grants permission to retrieve version metadata for the specified document.

GetFolder.name: GetFolder
GetFolder.description: Grants permission to retrieve the metadata of the specified folder.

GetFolderPath.name: GetFolderPath
GetFolderPath.description:
Grants permission to retrieve the path information (the hierarchy from the root folder)
                                                for the specified folder.

GetResources.name: GetResources
GetResources.description: Grants permission to get a collection of resources.

InitiateDocumentVersionUpload.name: InitiateDocumentVersionUpload
InitiateDocumentVersionUpload.description: Grants permission to create a new document object and version object.

RegisterDirectory.name: RegisterDirectory
RegisterDirectory.description: Grants permission to register a directory.

RemoveAllResourcePermissions.name: RemoveAllResourcePermissions
RemoveAllResourcePermissions.description: Grants permission to remove all the permissions from the specified resource.

RemoveResourcePermission.name: RemoveResourcePermission
RemoveResourcePermission.description:
Grants permission to remove the permission for the specified principal from the specified
                                                resource.

UpdateDocument.name: UpdateDocument
UpdateDocument.description: Grants permission to update the specified attributes of the specified document.

UpdateDocumentVersion.name: UpdateDocumentVersion
UpdateDocumentVersion.description: Grants permission to change the status of the document version to ACTIVE.

UpdateFolder.name: UpdateFolder
UpdateFolder.description: Grants permission to update the specified attributes of the specified folder.

UpdateInstanceAlias.name: UpdateInstanceAlias
UpdateInstanceAlias.description: Grants permission to update an instance alias.

UpdateUser.name: UpdateUser
UpdateUser.description:
Grants permission to update the specified attributes of the specified user, and grants
                                                or revokes administrative privileges to the Amazon WorkDocs site.
